Theni RDM Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 25 Village Assistant Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 14:02 IST
 National Disaster Management Authority
 25 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 11,100 to 35,100




FOLLOW

Theni Revenue and Disaster Management Department (Theni RDM) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 25 Village Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified for the Theni RDM Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates fill out the application forms before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Tamil Nadu.

Theni RDM Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Village Assistant 	25	10th Pass

Age limit for the Theni RDM Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 32 years.

Selection Process for the Theni RDM Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the Theni RDM Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 11,100 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 35,100 / per month.

Application fee for the Theni RDM Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the Theni RDM Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Village Assistant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the address given below.

Address

Concerned Revenue Taluka Office, Theni District.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	25-08-2025
Last Date of Application	24-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
